channel.title: Blogs on Vintrlik Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Vintrlik Blog

item.title: Old Gemini Posts
item.description: As mentioned in the previous article I used to run a blog back in the day. I used to write about rather random technical topics that would pop up. It was very opinionated. Mostly since I was quite influenced by Luke Smith who was my first serious introduction to the rabbit hole of Linux. I also quite liked HexDSL who introduced me to gemini and that’s how the bi-hosted site was born.

item.title: Hello Github Pages
item.description: I have kept a blog in the past. It was rather quirky. Half of the time it was available as html half as Gemini on vintrlik.org, which is no longer running. I basically hacked together my own static site generator. With a few lines of shell script and awk. It was not the pretiest thing ever but it did the job. I have since gone through quite a bit. Recently I stumbled upon my old archived blog posts.
